alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 08 at 12:11AM MST until May 08 at 11:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM PDT /11 AM MST/ TO 11 PM PDT /11 PM MST/ SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Mohave County in Arizona. Southeastern San Bernardino County and the Morongo Basin including Yucca Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous boating conditions on Lake Havasu. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Difficult driving conditions are possible, especially in high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Pierce Ferry Road between Dolan Springs and Grand Canyon West may experience dust storm activity that impacts travel.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Northwest Deserts
